entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy and ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
